product_name: Salomon Momentum Full-Zip Soft-Shell Pants - Men's
long_description: The Salomon Momentum full-zip soft-shell pants keep muscles toasty for cross-country skiing. Once you heat up, you can unzip them for ventilation or remove them without having to take off your skis. Wind-resistant front panels block chilly air; breathable fabric on the back prevents interior moisture buildup. Zippers on sides of legs open wide so you can instantly regulate your temperature. 2 hand pockets; drawcord waistband personalizes the fit. The Salomon Momentum II soft-shell pants feature an active fit that moves with you during activity-perfect for aerobic pursuits.
